title: The Other side
creator_credit: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM) and Zaljko Radic
brief_description: A 3D animation without dialogue. Kids will love this simple story with a Jules Verne influence. A moustached man in a brightly coloured flying machine travels through a surreal futuristic landscape searching for a lost city…Created using Lightwave, After FX and Premiere
